channel.title: Wtf? The system cannot find the path specified [HELP ME NAO]
channel.description:
This is what happens when I try to compile :|
[IMG]http://i537.photobucket.com/albums/ff336/stupefy12345/thesystem.jpg[/img]
This is what JDK I have
[IMG]http://i537.photobucket.com/albums/ff336/stupefy12345/JDK.jpg[/img]
And this is my CLASSPATH & PATH
[CODE]SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/code]
[CODE]C:\Sun\AppServer\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_05\bin[/code]
My compiler: [CODE]@echo off CoryScape Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\YOURJAVAVERSION\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
My runserver: [CODE]@echo off CoryScape Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\YOURJAVAVERSION\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Help please?

item.title: Wtf? The system cannot find the path specified [HELP ME NAO]

item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

How do I get a new JDK? You’re a big help with this.
